attributes.title: AWFUL
attributes.review: I am so ashamed to be writing this as a loyal Trump supporter, but sadly as a Technician from Georgia it is my duty to report and call out apps that do not work. As a mother of 4 beautiful children and a supporter of the best man to ever live I just canâ€™t support this application. Firstly, after opening the app many ad pop ups appear, making it very frustrating and difficult to navigate the app. Secondly the lay out is horrendous, unappealing and distracting. Again my apologies but some person has to call this app out :(
